quest.name: Forge Ahead
journal: Amidst the sadness of Alphinaud's countenance, there is a newfound determination.
objectives: Speak with Alphinaud and have him accompany you.
Speak with Alisaie while accompanied by Alphinaud and have them accompany you.
Follow the crystalline path while accompanied by Alphinaud and Alisaie, and speak with Alphinaud at the designated location.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Fools, all of them... Fools...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: That crystalline path─G'raha has paved it for us.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Difficult as it is, we must carry on. For our friends, and all who await us in faith.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So come, let us seek the path's beginning. It appears to be near the outpost.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I won't let it break me, don't you worry. I never have, and I never will.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Look, Forename. A portal has opened.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It will surely deliver us true. It must.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Travel through the portal?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Look up, Forename. It's as though the stars are being devoured by the dead sun...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And that's where we're headed─into the maw of darkness.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, here is where the path begins. And it ascends to dizzying heights...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us make our way, one sure step at a time.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Now more than ever, we must walk as one. Will you go and take Alisaie's hand?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forgotten something, have you? Very well, we'll be waiting by the portal.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Aye, let us press on. One sure step at a time, till we win through to Meteion.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We should keep moving. Go and tell Alphinaud, will you?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should have Alphinaud accompanying you before setting forth.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Our friends got us this far. Their courage, their strength. Their wisdom. Their love.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We owe it to them to continue. No matter how long it takes...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alphinaud and Alisaie are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Gaze at the distant stars.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Listen to the silence.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Look back on the path.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Offer a word of comfort.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Look at the path ahead.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Should you start to fall, we'll be here to catch you. I know you'll do the same for us.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie appears to have fallen behind... We had best head back and fetch her.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: G'raha paved this path for us. We were meant to follow it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Where did Alphinaud disappear to now? We need to turn around and look for him.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We understand, take what time you need. When you're ready to continue, we'll be waiting by the portal.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If you're ready, then so am I. Let's follow the path where it leads!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The innumerable lights that shine in the distance─to think that they all could have birthed civilizations...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: To think that everything they built has gone to dust, their peoples lost to despair... Of the stars floating in this sea of midnight, ours is a lonely aberration.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And yet...no matter how many worlds have met their ends, with you and Alisaie beside me, there is nothing I fear. No ocean so vast I cannot cross.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Those broken stars I see─shattered, ruptured, unraveled─I wonder if they're also worlds recreated at their ends...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The sight of them fills me with a sorrow I cannot describe...and a truth I cannot deny.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Birth...and death. Whence we came and where we'll return. A wheel from which there is no escape.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Thancred would scout the road ahead. Y'shtola and Urianger would trade opinions on esoteric subjects.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: G'raha would join in their discussion, or else chat with me and Alisaie about the mission. Estinien would be at the rear, apart yet present.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: All the while you would come and go. Wherever you are needed. And together, we would travel...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: All I can hear are my footfalls. My heartbeat. It's so much quieter now...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But the fact we can breathe and continue on is proof that the others are still with us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: They are... They are... Aren't they...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The portal is barely visible from up here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Truly, we've come far. Much farther than would have been possible had we kept chasing perfect ideals as we did in the past.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It is because we have known failure and frustration─that we have learned and grown from them─that Hydaelyn has entrusted us with this mission. With the fate of the very star.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It's all a dream, isn't it...? A long, elaborate dream...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Any moment now, I'll wake up in my bed. Still a student. Grandfather alive. I'd go about my day, relieved as the fragments of that other life fade away...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And that would be happiness...wouldn't it? That none of it... No. No, I won't give up these experiences. Good and bad, they are mine. They are me.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Rest assured I am fine...but thank you for your concern. What of yourself? Though we can't afford to be too leisurely, neither need we rush unduly.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We've crossed an impossible distance to stand where we are now, and we're but a few steps away from journey's end. It will be over before we know it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Me...? Oh, I still have plenty of legs left in me, don't you worry. It's you I'm worried about.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You always push yourself so hard for us─for everyone. And while we're here, we'll make sure to bear our share of the burden.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, this is it. The end of the path, and the beginning of whatever awaits.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There will be greater hardships. We may be made to feel powerless.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yet come what may, let us have no regrets. No, let us have pride in what we have achieved.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In what we achieved, and how it changed us for the better... That's worth fighting for. And dying for. As they did...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There are some structures up ahead. Still a ways to go before we reach the dead sun...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Given...all this...I know how naive it must sound to hope it all works out somehow.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Still, you'll forgive me if I wish for it all the same. And for you most of all.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Not that you of all people need it. It's just...after all the help you've given me, for once I want to be the one to help you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Of all the recreated worlds we've seen, this one feels the most familiar...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should have Alisaie accompanying you before continuing.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This is almost...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Normal? It's not unlike many cities we know. But it's deathly quiet...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Mayhap the inhabitants are within the buildings. Or invisible to our senses.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: (-???-)Wrong on both counts. There is simply no one here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Meteion!

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: This is how I found it when I arrived. Another star which once pulsed with life, but no longer.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: How it ended, I do not know. Invasion, sickness, suicide─none can say.

dialogue.name: METEION
dialogue.text: None lived to speak for the dead. They are gone. Gone. Search all you like, but you'll only end up turning back.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If what Meteion says is true, what are we supposed to do...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If there is no one here, then neither should there be emotion to bar our way.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yet Meteion seems convinced we'll turn back. What riddle is this...?
